title: Orders: Reporting by Regulated Entities of Stress Testing Results as of December 31, 2024; Summary Instructions and Guidance
abstract: In this document, the Federal Housing Finance Agency (FHFA) provides notice that it issued Orders, dated March 4, 2025, with respect to stress test reporting as of December 31, 2024, under the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (Dodd-Frank Act), as amended by the Economic Growth, Regulatory Relief, and Consumer Protection Act (EGRRCPA). Summary Instructions and Guidance accompanied the Orders to provide testing scenarios.
